"Lick my foot, tactician," Maribelle said simply, "Or you will face something far WORSE as punishment."

'Well, I really don't have any choice in the matter, and I cannot simply convince her to reconsider my alibi.' You thought, thoroughly defeated at any possible way to get out of this mess.

"I'm waiting," She snapped.

You had no choice but to comply, so you began to lick where you started to in the first place: the ball of her foot. It was fresh out of the boots you were in, and still very sweaty. Although, it somehow tasted sweeter than before. It smelled of roses and dandelions. Maribelle began to smile contemptuously, enjoying her power over you. Unknown to her, you began to like servicing her feet. Tasting them was almost, pleasant, in a way. 'Why am I enjoying this?' The reasonable part of your mind thought, confused, 'And why is Maribelle acting like this?' You decided that it was unreasonable not to ask her about this sudden change in attitude.

"Why are you enjoying this," You question, "You've never shown any kind of enjoyment in belittling people before."

"I... honestly do not know why," She stuttered, " B-but you have no right to question me now!"

Surprisingly, she blushed at her own doubt in her actions, and slight embarrassment. 'Strange, she never acts this shyly in front of other people,' you think, wondering why she isn't all that angry at you for embarrassing her. You continue to lick her sweaty foot, and start wondering about why she is acting strangely.
'Should I question her more about her actions?' You ponder.
1111122211.title: Licking my feet, it actually felt somewhat good.

You become naught but a stain on Maribelle's smooth foot.

You watched hopefully as Maribelle's foot began to rise, only for your hopes to be crushed (quite literally) as her foot came slamming back down onto you! She then began to stomp you over and over again, cracking your ribs and breaking your limbs! The pressure had been bad before, but this was much worse! She began to stop, feeling that her boot was back to normal.

"Ah. Much better. I must have stepped on something wet earlier." Maribelle said, as she kept walking.

You couldn't feel anything right now. You were in so much pain, and the walking just made it worse! You knew that you wouldn't survive much longer if you stayed here, but there was nothing you could do! Eventually, you passed out, the world becoming dark for you.

Now...

You look on to see the princess herself, Lissa. You flinch in fear as you see her stir in her sleep. She begins to get, and you try to find somewhere to hide, but there isn't anywhere to go. You look back at her to see her looking at you with wide eyes.

"You're alive!" She yelled with joy.

Lissa ran up to where you were on her table, and began to speak.

"I thought you were dead! Don't scare me like that!" She exclaimed

You looked into her eyes, and you saw that she was...
11111222211.title: Lissa!

choices: "I want you to pretend to be a bug in Olivia's food!"
"I want you to do something special with Tiki for me..."
111112222112.content:
"More!? But Lissa, you almost freaking killed me last time!" you shout. You just couldn't take any more if this girl's "humor".

"Well yeah. But the key word there is 'almost' little guy! Heehee!" Lissa winks at you and sticks out her tongue like some anime girl, but you were in no mood. "Oh come on, don't tell me Belle's feet were that bad! Trust me, mine are waaaay worse."

Why won't she listen to you!? Doesn't she understand your life is literally in her hands? Or is that the point? Does she just not care what happens to you at all? The thought scares you.

"Alright, so I've thought up some more hilrious pranks that involve you!" Lissa begins...
111112222112.title: Get ready for more pranks!

choices: Olivia notices you at the last second
1111122221121.content:
You sat silently, dumbfounded by the girl's words. "You want me to do what now?" Lissa's suggestion was so unbelievable, it required a second statement.

"I said, I want you to pretend to be a bug in Olivia's food!" Lissa started toward the mess tent with a spring in her step. Just when you thought this girl's pranks couldn't get any more insane, she came up with this. You considered objecting, but by this point you knew she would not listen to a thing you had to say. All you could do was pray silently that this Olivia person Lissa mentioned was either not hungry, or observant enough to spot you before it was too late.

"I know I saw Olivia in here just a minute ago..." Lissa peered into the tent. There were a number of tables laid out, but no one seemed to be present. in fact, the only sign anyone had been here within the last day was a solitary bowl of what looked like stew sitting near the end of a table. Lissa walked over to it and scanned the bowl's contents. "Beef stew with carrots and asparagus? That's Olivia's favorite, this must be hers!" Lissa held you in her palm over the warm stew. From your perspective, the waiting bowl was at least 50 feet down. Slowly, Lissa rotated the hand containing you, until you slid out of her grasp and dropped towards Olivia's stew bowl.

The fall seemed to last an eternity, but eventually, you hit the waiting meal with a soft splash. Lissa knelt down to observe you at eye-level. "Okay, I'm going wait at another table. I can't wait to see the look on Olivia's face when she sees you!" If she sees me, you thought to yourself. Lissa stood to full height and left you to wallow in the warm broth as the both of you waited for Olivia to return to her meal. You licked your soaked fingers, the soup smelled and tasted pleasant, but this was no time to get distracted. You push through the broth and vegetables to the edge of the bowl, but unfortunately for you, the ends proved too steep to climb, especially when you're covered in a slick of broth. Defeated, you sulked further into the stew and waited patiently for the prank target to return.

Soon, you heard footsteps coming from the direction of the mess tent flap. You peaked over the brim of the bowl and saw a pink-haired woman entering. Her footfalls grew louder and louder as she neared the bowl, until she sat down directly in front of it, confirmed your suspicions that this was Olivia.. The woman took a fork and resumed eating her meal, completely oblivious to you, much to your disappointment. You tried waving your arms and yelling up at her, but still she did not notice anything amiss. As she ate, Olivia often sighed and took aside glances, as if there was something serious on her mind distracting her. Without noticing, Olivia scooped you up on her next forkful, and drew you close towards her mouth. Her soft, pink lips parted to reveal her enormous rows of pearly white teeth. Panic overtook your mind and adrenaline surged in your veins as you made one final attempt to get the gigantic woman to notice you. Screaming at the top of your lungs, the fork showed no sign of slowing down as you came closer and closer to being devoured by the beautiful giantess...
1111122221121.title: Shrinking Violet

11111222211211.content:
The moist cavern of Olivia's mouth came nearer and nearer. It appeared Lissa's little prank was about to backfire on you horribly. The giantess' warm breath washed over you, still remaining completely blind to your desperate struggle. All appeared lost, but suddenly, just as the fork was about to move into Olivia's mouth, it stopped. You stared wide-eyed as the dark cave in front of you closed and the fork backed slowly away from Olivia's lips. Heart still racing, you took several rapid breaths to try and calm your panic level. Meanwhile, Olivia peered down at her fork, having finally taken notice of something in her lunch that did not belong.

"Is that a..." Olivia's eyes went wide as she realized just what was caught up in her meal. "Eek!" the giant woman's fingers released the fork, and once more you found yourself falling, this time onto the table. The fork struck the wooden surface with a sharp CLANG, you along with it. The fall was not enough to do any serious harm to you, but you could tell you were going to be sore for a little while after an impact like that. You held your aching head in one hand, and used the other to push yourself up off of your back. The pink-haired woman looked down at you with shock in her eyes and a hand covering her mouth. You silently thanked every god you could think of for sparing your life.

Olivia leaned down to get a better look at the odd bug she thought she had nearly swallowed with her lunch. You looked up to see her massive brown eyes scanning over you. Two braids of pink hair framed her face as Olivia examined you like a bug under a microscope. "Wait, you're not a bug..." Olivia observed. Her voice was soft and demure, much unlike Lissa's loud and brash manner of speaking, almost refreshingly so. You tried to wipe the now-cold broth off of yourself as Olivia's hand came forth and gave you a gentle poke with her index finger. Even this beautiful girl's most gentle touch was enough to knock you off balance. Olivia's gasped lightly as you planted our feet firmly back on the ground. "A tiny person? How did this happen? And how did you get in my stew?"

Behind Olivia, Lissa was nearing her breaking point. This whole time, she had been watching your plight and getting more and more "Giggly" as time went on. By now, Lissa could barely contain herself. Her stifled giggles broke into full on laughter, echoing in the tent. Olivia turned around to face the laughing princess. "Lissa? What's so funny? Did you do this?" the dancer's questions only grew in number. Lissa tried desperately to curb her laughter. "Oh man, you should have seen the look on your face when you saw him! That was hilarious! Ahahaha!" Lissa allowed laughter to reclaim her, as she leaned on a table to keep herself upright. "So this was your doing!" Olivia was suddenly standing tall and resolute. "This is a joke to you? You almost made me eat this tiny man! Could you imagine what would have happened if I didn't notice him?" The normally modest dancer was absolutely indignant right now. Lissa could not answer her questions, however, the apparent hilarity of this situation was too much for her, and lost upon Olivia. Scowling at the girl, Olivia gently took you in one hand and walked out of the mess tent, away from Lissa and her insane pranks. Finally, it seemed like your tiny life was in the hands of someone who actually cared for your safety.

Olivia looked back over her shoulder as the distance between her and the mess tent grew. You looked up at her pretty face, still pouting and red in the cheeks. She carried you away from the trickster princess and into her own tent. "Oh thank god, that's over." you said more to yourself than Olivia. "Thank you so much for rescuing me. You have no idea what Lissa has put me through!" Olivia sat down at a small desk and allowed you to fall from her hand onto it's hard surface. She looked down at you, still wearing the same scowl as before. "So, Lissa has a tiny trickster accomplice, now? I don't know how you got so small, but that joke was not funny. You nearly scared the life out of me!" The irony of this statement seemed to fly right over the pretty young dancer's head. "No, you've got it all wrong! I didn't want to do any of this! Lissa forced me into it, I swear!"

Olivia only raised an eyebrow quizzically, considering the possible truth of your words.
11111222211211.title: Olivia notices you at the last second

111112222112111.content:
Olivia's expression changed from sour to soft. "Wait, what?" the outrage had completely disappeared from her voice, replaced with concern and curiosity. "Lissa, that girl forced me to be her prank accomplice, and it's been a horrible experience. She put me in Maribelle's boot, for god's sake!" You explain to the giant dancer. "I didn't want to do any of this, I promise you." Olivia was taken aback, finally facing the truth of the situation. "Oh gods, that must have been horrible. I had the completely wrong idea, I'm so sorry!" Olivia brought her hand towards you, and held it palm up as if inviting you to climb aboard. "I don't know how you got like this, or how Lissa got her hands on you, but you're safe with me. I promise."

Comforted by her words, you stepped forth and climbed into Olivia's waiting palm. The plush platform pulled closer to Olivia's body, and she brought her free hand to gently stroke your head with her index finger. After a long day underfoot, it seems your worries were finally vanishing. You may still be tiny, but with this pretty dancer watching over you like a benevolent goddess, you knew you would be perfectly safe. Silently, you sat and simply let Olivia coddle you to her heart's content. Eventually, you felt her finger retreat, and turned your attention up to her face.

"I'm terribly, sorry, but, I must ask something of you." Olivia looked away, and her face turned rose red. "What would that be?" you asked her, eager to return the compassion she showed you. "I was going to practice my dancing, but I just can't do it with you watching me." Olivia fidgeted. "I'm going to leave you here, but I need you to promise me you won't watch me. Please?" the woman stared down at you, her eyes pleading as much as here voice. How could you deny the woman that just saved you from servitude to Lissa something so simple? "Say no more, I'll have my back turned the whole time." Olivia smiled, which proved infectious as you turned your back to the woman so that she could dance.

Olivia took several deep breaths to compose herself, and soon your could hear her feet fall and her body sway as she danced. You used all your willpower to try and keep your promise to her, but you could not resist sneaking a peek at Olivia's moves. You broke your promise and spun around to spectate Olivia's performance, and found yourself absolutely mesmerized. Olivia's pink hair flew as she moved, and her footfalls were so graceful you could not even hear them. The young woman did not even seem to notice you had broken your promise, whether because you were shrunken, or because she was just so into her dancing. You stared slack jawed until eventually, the dance came to a close. Olivia turned her attention back towards you, and immediately took on her iconic blush when she noticed you had broken your promise.

"Ack!" Olivia reeled in horror at the thought of her dancing having been observed. "Y-You promised not to watch!" Olivia pouted down at you. "I'm sorry, Olivia, but you're just so beautiful, I couldn't help myself! The dance was amazing, I might add, you're clearly highly skilled in your art!" You complimented the betrayed giantess, fearing what she could do to punish you if she so chose. Your flattery seemed to give her pause, however. Maybe she would be willing to forgive?
111112222112111.title: Trust Exercise

111112222112112.content:
Olivia scowled down at you. If looks could kill, you'd be long dead by now. It seemed she would not believe your testimony. "Lissa may be a prankster, but she's not so reckless as to put you at risk like that." If only she knew what you had been through, she would be singing a different tune. "You shrunk yourself with some magic to satisfy your perverted urges, didn't you?" The enraged titaness grabbed you between her fingertips and held you up to face level, your body dangling like a puppet on strings. Resist as you might, a glance towards the floor, now several hundred miles down from your perspective, stopped you in your tracks. You watched in awe as the massive face of your new captress came closer. "You jumped in my lunch to get close to my mouth, hm?" Olivia brought you lower to face her enormous, predatory lips. She gave them a lick, and you shuddered at the size of her tongue, the muscle dwarfing you by several degrees. "Well, let me give you what you wanted!" The goddess' voice completely surrounded you, and your found yourself suddenly thrown through the arch of Olivia's open lips, and into her hungry maw.

You fell onto Olivia's soft tongue, and immediately the smell of stew hit you like a truck. You raised your head off the slimy surface to look around, you were penned in by a row of pearly white teeth, some still having shreds of meat and vegetables stuck between them from Olivia's meal. You tried to get solid footing, but the tongue's surface proved too wet and soft to stand up on. Slow and deliberately, Olivia closed her lips, engulfing you in darkness. You could see nothing, and hear only the sounds of Olivia's body, her gentle breath rushing over you like a hurricane, and her distant heartbeat sounding in a steady rhythm. When you tried to move toward her lips, Olivia felt it, and maneuvered you underneath the tongue with surprising dexterity. The sloppy muscle pushed down on top of your head, forcing you face-down into a small pool of the girl's saliva. You coughed and gagged for air, which Olivia must have heard, because your world began shaking violently, you along with it. The massive quake had been caused by only a light giggle from the dancer. As Olivia's tongue oppressed you, you started to feel new vibrations from the organic cavern, this time much, much light, but now more rhythmic. It occurred to you that Olivia must be walking somewhere, but where to, you had no idea. Your torture at the hands of Olivia's tongue continued, as she made her way to wherever it was she was going. Eventually, you felt Olivia's footsteps stop, and the oppressive tongue ease the pressure off of you. Light returning to the moist cavern and Olivia's fingers entering after you confirmed your hopes that she would finally be letting you out.

Olivia grabbed you with two fingers like she had before and held you out, back into the sunlight. You were still covered in her spit, but at least you were finally free from that claustrophobic space. You felt yourself falling, thankfully still in Olivia's grasp. The ground came closer and closer as the woman lowered, kneeling to set you gently down in the grass. Each blade was taller than you were, making hard to see anything. You craned your neck upwards as Olivia stood back up to her full, monolithic height. "You're someone else problem now, bug." Olivia said as she raised her foot above you. You instinctively reeled back, closing your eyes and waiting for the end, but thankfully, you were eclipsed in Olivia's shadow as she stepped over you instead, leaving you to quake with the grass at the heavenly step. You watched the pink of Olivia's hair disappear behind a landscape of grass, wanting to follow her and get away from her simultaneously. You were pulled out of your trance by the thought that the open ground was the most dangerous spot for someone of your stature, where anyone walking by could easily crush you underfoot without so much as knowing. You could see the tops of multiple other tents over the grass blades, you dashed for what looked like the nearest one, hoping to find safety within. You crawled under the tent's flap and found yourself looking up at yet another colossal woman. But who's tent did you stumble into this time?
111112222112112.title: Olivia thinks you're a liar

So she picked you up and removed her boot. You shook your head as you dangled above her boot. You could smell it from above, and it wasn't pleasant. "No. Don't do it! Please!" Lissa continued to see it as you overreacting to a harmless game. "Come on it couldn't be THAT bad." Without the chance of further protest she dropped you in.

The smell inside was just as bad as it was from above. The smelly, hot, and humid atmosphere of the boot sickened you and nearly brought you to your knees. The surface was a bit wet from sweat probably. It surprised you how such a foul smell could come from someone so beautiful. She looks down at you and recoils from her own foot stink. "Oh man that's bad. Hopefully you won't mind if I wear the boot. I have to get back to the others." You managed to make a response. "Are you crazy? You'll crush me!" She just laughs at you. "I'm a healer, silly. Here this will make you a bit more durable." Using her staff, she caused a green light to envelope you. You certainly felt a bit tougher from it.

"Ok here we go, little guy." She says and immediately you see her foot enter the boot. "No! You can't do this!" Your screams were in vain and you quickly move back from the huge foot drawing closer to you. You could not back up any further and were trapped. You braced yourself as her foot came over you and pinned you down. Only your head poked out from under her sole next to her big toe. The smell was ten times as bad now. You could hear Lissa speaking above you. "Wow your kinda comfortable down there. Walking around so much sure makes a girl's foot hurt." She pressed her toes against you head. She giggled. "Wow. I'm having fun already! I'm sure you are as well." You certainly were not having fun, and as she began to walk her foot pressed down on you which was painful. As if it weren't enough her sweat was rubbing off on you. You didn't know how much longer you could take this extreme discomfort and disgust.
111121.title: How Can A Princess' Boot Smell So Bad?

It was unfair, she should be riding into battle to face their enemy's at Robins side, instead she is treated like a child. She flops down on her bed staring at the ceiling with one leg hanging off the bed.

You walk over to the bed being sure to keep a safe distance from her foot knowing what she could do. You soon here a rhythmic breathing above signifying the slumbering Lucina. What should you do?

You call out again from the floor, calling for help, but it seems that your voice is only loud enough to be a noticeable noise to her, not fully distinct words. "M-my! A tiny person!"Lucina exclaims in surprise and she gets up from the bed, her pretty, yet enormous bare feet land just in front of you as she sits on the edge of it to take a closer look at you

"Who are you?"She finally asks looking at you with mix of curiousity, and slight leftover sleepiness from before
At the moment she asks you realize something... you can't remember anything from before you woke up in this room. You explain that to Lucina.
"Amnesia? That's odd... Robin also had amnesia when he first appeared. He definitely wasn't completely shrunken like you though..."Says Lucina
You ask whether Robin would be able to help with your situation.
"I don't think so... Robin is very smart, but he is mostly a strategist. Besides, he, my father and others are currently battling our enemies, while I was left there."Lucina says the last sentence with mix of sadness and irritation
You decide to ask why did they leave her like that.
"Well... I made a stupid mistake while training yesterday, stepped badly with my foot, and it hurt me for a few hours. The pain is almost gone today, but my father and Robin still told me to rest... I understand their worry but I hate just sitting idly like that when our world is in danger!"Lucina sounded almost angry there, and you could clearly see how being left like that irritated her

"Well anyway, I'm afraid that magic that shrinks people isn't really my thing... but perhaps we could go to Tharja's tent and look for something there? She is a specialist from various hexes and potions..."Says Lucina and then tries to rise from her bed, but then...
"Kya!"Lucina yelps in pain, and lands back on the bed, one of her feet almost accidentally hit you but you managed to dodge
You ask if she is alright

Perhaps you should try to give her a massage? She is probably too proud to ask for one herself, but It might help for the pain... and even if not, Lucina agreed to help you without even knowing you, so you probably should at least try to help her a bit as well.

Lucina leapt to her feet and hurried over ( Nearly crushing you underfoot in the process). " Robin my love, what's....." She fell silent as she realized that the man who used to stand above her 5'8 frame was now chest height on her. " By the gods, it's like your fading away." She said worriedly.

Lucina could only watch as her love shrank before her very eyes. He reached waist height, then shin height and finally barely taller than her shoe. Lucina stood shocked at the now tiny Robin at her feet. She slowly crouched down and gently picked him up, struggling to find encouraging words. " Well... At least you found me, and not Tharja." Oh but don't worry, I won't hurt you." With that she began walking towards her bed.

"I really only want my little Robin, you however..." Lucina looks at you with a hungry glare, "...You I don't have to worry about. Since you've witnessed this whole event you're the last thing standing in my way!"

You were too terrified to protest. All you could do was stare at Lucina's gorgeous face as she gave you one last smile and placed you on her bed. How could a girl as beautiful as a goddess be so cruel? Lucina turned around, showing off her equally beautiful backside.

Her bountiful bottom was tight but firm, being concealed under her skirt and made even more pronounced by her tights, it was a sight only you had ever seen. As her butt slowly filled your entire field of vision, all you could do was be glad that you were going down such a pretty girl. To think just the act of this teenager sitting was enough to end you was funny and depressing all at once.

You thought about running, but her behind was so large compared to you there was no way you'd make it, even if you did, she'd just catch you again.

Even though it felt like an eternity for you, for Lucina it was over in seconds, she sat on her cot and grinded her butt into it a bit to get more comfy and to make sure you were gone for good. She could feel your tiny body flattened beneath her mighty girlish frame and smiled. "I'm sorry little guy! If only you were a little larger I would have kept you as a pillow..."

111331112.title: " It was quite the stressful day, how about...

choices: Maribelle brews some piping hot tea to "share" with you.
Maribelle punishes your perverted mind with her body.
11133112.content:
You try to explain your story, but Maribelle’s face becomes more and more frustrated. You can feel her slender fingers close in on you, but it happens too quickly for you to react. The fingers wrap around you, pinning your arms to your side as the giantess’s eye narrow. Her glare bores deep into you.

“Don’t play me for a fool, you little scoundrel! As if I’d believe that you just woke up shrunken and clinging to my leg!” You weren’t ready for such an ear-splitting voice to ring out of her beautiful, lush lips. It dawns on you just how much this woman towers over you. “You must have done this on purpose. You ought to be ashamed, ravishing the leg of a lady such as myself! Perverted cur! Ugh!”

You didn’t like the way this was going. Maribelle’s grip was tightening on you, her soft, dainty fingers forcing the air out of you. You want to tell her that she’s mistaken, that you weren’t leering at her at all. But the crushing pain is too much. The terrifying goddess brings you closer to herself, and your gasping lungs are filled with her perfume instead on the air that you so desperately need.

“How did some lowborn lout even change his size? Did some grimy mage put you up to this?” You try to object again, but you can only let out a feeble choke. Maribelle’s radiant eyes widen as she gasps in realization. “THAT’S why. You’re a sniveling little spy trying to get to my dear Chrom through me! Or Lissa! Goodness!”

Her grip finally loosens, and you gasp for sweet air. Her hand takes you down to the bed, where she pins you down with only one finger. Still breathing heavily, you notice that you have the clearest look at Maribelle that you’ve had so far. She had not escaped the rain entirely, parasol or not, and her wet outfit clung tightly to her towering figure. If your own size was even comparable to hers, she would have been a delicate-looking beauty. But you quickly regain your senses when the giantess pulls out a spool of thread and a knitting needle. You need to talk some sense into her!

“I’m not a spy, honest!” you plead, as she turns you over and you feel her fingers maneuvering your arms behind you.

“Don’t think your silver tongue will sway me, you repugnant worm!” She begins knitting the thread around you tiny wrists with incredible precision. “I’m much too clever to fall for the lies of filth like you.”

She jerks the thread violently, painfully finishing a strict knot. Then the thread starts weaving around your torso. You might as well keep trying before it is too late. “Please! I don’t know how I got here, or why I’m so small, but I swear I’m not here to hurt you! I-Hurgh!!” you cry as you’re cut short by another painful jerk.

“You needn’t worry about hurting anyone. Not anymore.” Maribelle states coldly. She resumes her work, this time binding your ankles. “I had thought that the rain would be my biggest delay to rendezvousing with Chrom’s party, but I simply can’t have you eavesdropping on our strategies when I get there. Tell me everything and delay me no further, you putrid scum! I LOATHE delays.” You feel the thread dig into your ankles as it tightens into place. “What did your filthy cohorts send you to learn?”

You stare up helplessly at this beautiful behemoth before you. There’s nothing you can say to quell her fury, at least nothing that she will believe. You can only wait in horror for whatever fate her gorgeous, devilish smirk has in store for you.
11133112.title: Tiny Spy

choices: Yes. There must be a way.
111331121.content:
You meet Maribelle’s intense glare with your look of utter terror for a solid 30 seconds. The noblewoman eyes you up and down expectantly, but your words just won’t leave your throat. Her reddened face fades back to normal.

“Very well, then. We can stay here as long as you like.”

She gets off of the bed. Her eyes never leave you, and you can hear the massive clacking of her heels as she walks across the room. You don’t know where you are, but this seemingly abandoned shack still has a functioning stove. You watch each other as Maribelle begins brewing something in it. She speaks again “This dreadful weather has me absolutely chilling.”

Your hoarse throat still proving useless, you instead decide to test the strength of your binds. You can barely move your arms, no matter how you twist and turn your wrists. Your ankles fare no better. You are tied far too tightly to budge an inch. Only now that you’ve been given space to think do you realize that there is tightness in your pants as well. You can hardly believe that this situation is actually turning you on.

Maribelle simply watches you struggle, a thoughtful look on her face. She pours some tea into a cup. “How cold must one as small as you be?” she asks. She takes a sip of her tea, evidentially waiting for an answer. You try to oblige her, but your dry throat can’t seem to scrape out the words. And why should it? You’re cold, scared, and in pain. You feel like doing anything but talking to your tormenter, so you roll over to look the other way.

“So you’re just going to clam up, then?” she continues, “Gods, you’re not making this easy for either of us. Why won’t you just confess?”

You don’t answer.

You hear her boots clacking again as she approaches you. You feel one of the knot threads pulling you up. Maribelle suspends you in the air, and as you dangle you can feel extremely hot steam rising around you. You look down in panic. She’s dangling you over her fresh, bubbling hot tea!

“Now you see here, little man. I’d sooner die than let you or your brigands harm my darling Lissa or Chrom. You’ll have to tell me sooner or later, and I would rather not stoop to torture, so out with it. Who are those scoundrels after!?”

You can feel the heat intensify as you are slowly lowered into your searing fate. But how can you stop this? Can you convince her of anything?
111331121.title: In a Bind at Tea Time

You look back to see a giant, beautiful stone that had many lustrous colors on it. "Where did that come from?" You wonder before more earthquakes start again.

This time you could see the cause of them behind the rock. Behind the rock towered a gigantic young girl with pointed ears and other strange features. She got onto her knees to grab the colored rock, and you try to hide from her view. However she seemed to have been plenty aware of you because after she grabbed the rock, she quickly snatched you up as well. Constricted rather forcefully in her gloved hand, you're brought up to her face where her eyes look you over. After a moment, a gasp escapes her mouth and...

1151.content:
You awake with a massive headache. Your entire body is stiff and you can feel the hard, uneven ground beneath you. You try to open your eyes only to instantly be blinded by a bright light and instinctively cover your face with your hands. You can hardly remember what happened, other than a few bits and pieces that pop up in your head.

You were on your way home. It was dark and in some alleyway this guy walked towards you. Then someone or something hit you hard from behind. Everything was blurry when the last things you heard were that guy saying: “That finishes business here. You! Go dump this him somewhere!” Though his voice. It sounded weird. Kind of disturbed, but that must have been from the blow to the head.

Wait, to the head?

As your eyes now slowly adjusted to the light you reached to the back of your head and, as expected, it felt wet. But there is something soft underneath it like a knapsack. When you pull your hand back in front of your face, you could see you are wearing black and purple gloves. Given they are now also a bit soaked with your blood, but they seem oddly familiar to you.

After your eyes now fully adjusted to the light, you slowly rise of the ground almost falling over on your face now. Then something falls over your head. It's the hood of a cloak you are wearing now, with the same colours of your gloves and some familiar pattern. After taking a second look, it appears to be made from a single piece of a scaled creatures skin.

“Where did I get this thing?” you think, before you notice something far more important. “What in the world could be big enough to make this from?!” you almost shout. You try to think of an animal, but you don’t know anything that has such colouring and patterns.“Ah, whatever. Now, where the hell am I?” you think, throwing away the other questions for now.

Once you take a look around, you notice something bad. You are in the middle of nowhere in waist high bushes. Funny their pretty flat. It's almost like huge grass. "Great. Just great. What comes next? Am I gonna get assaulted by the wildlife?" you say jokingly, though a part of you knows if that would happen, it's not going to end well. You grab the bag and throw it over your shoulder. You know there will be enough time to see what's inside. After all your not expecting to see anything intelligent for sometime and your bleeding seems to have stopped to. At least for now.

But before you can get moving, you see something coming your way. You try to see what it is, fearing the worst, but you are reliefed when you make out what it is. It's a woman slowly moving in your direction. She is a true beauty. The curves of her face are soft and her skin is seemingly perfect. She has full and firm, smooth lips. You can see that she didn't even use make-up. Her beauty is completely natural, just like her deep green eyes. You could get lost in them for hours. Her long hair is a bright lime-green in colour. It is being held in a little bit messy, but still nice looking ponytail by a red band of sorts. There is a headpiece of somekind she wears that doesn't look all that great in combination with the rest of her, but who are you to judge others fashion sense, considering what you are wearing yourself.

Speaking of clothes, most of her clothing was in different shades of red with the little cape she wears in pink. Her boots were red like roses in the summer with heels and go up all the way to her knees. The moment you realize that one of her feet comes down next to you and after another second you finally get the situation. You are tiny! Maybe 4 inch tall, if you're lucky! You mind is racing and you can hardly think straight, but one thing is certain to you right now and that is that you need help. The only help anywhere near you though is the giantess that's about to walk pass you, which leaves you with barely enough time to jump on her boot and grab hold of it, before you get an actually stable and slow ride.

Leaning against the leg behind you, you look up to only for your view to be blocked by the rather big chest of your ride. You quickly look back in the direction your headed, before you see something you may shouldn't. The area around you is just like it seemed from the ground itself. Plains of grass with no town or anything nearby, though you could see a bit more rough terrain, probably a mountain range, on your way. The steady movement of and silence of the land around you - or is it the blood loss from before? - is making you sleepy and you could feel yourself slowly drifting back to sleep - or a coma if you're really lucky.

You don't know how much time has passed since you fell asleep, but when you wake up, you find yourself in front of what seems to be the ruins of some temple or somthing similar. After that you notice the ground below you feels different. It doesn't feel like the soft fabric of the boots, but more like cold, hard rock which you confirm with a look beneath you. Then you hear something move behind you. Once again out of instinct, you jump up and spin around only to lose your balance and fall back over completely dizzy. You could hear a giggle and once your vision became clear again, the giantess with you hitched a ride, is filling your whole sight. She looks down on you with a gentle smile.

Basicly frozen with fear of what this gorgeous beauty could do to you, you are happy that you are so scared you can't even piss yourself, which would be more embarresing than anything else. After a few seconds of silence and awkward starring at each other you manage to get a weak, quiet "Hello" out.
1151.title: Tiki, the voice of Naga

choices: Stay with Tiki. Just in case something might happen, when you're on your own.
Go and take a look around. Maybe there is something in these ruins you know.
11511.content:
Starring at the lady towering above you was both, fearsome and fascinating. On one side there are all the possibilitys of how easely you could get killed by her. Crushed, eaten, tortured, unintentionally stepped on - which almost happened! - or a fate even worse. Becoming nothing but a mere slave, though for you that last option might not be so bad, given what a beauty your mistress would be, but still you would be everything other than happy.
On the other side of your mind, just looking at her face seemed to calm you down bit by bit. It's as if her presence alone, is enough to make your worrys flow away like a silent river and her gentle, soft smile makes you feel welcome lika a warm breeze, when you step inside your house and out of a snow storm.

It feels like your starring at her for hours, but somehow you know it are merely seconds, before the lady replies to your greet, which your surprised she even heard, since you barely even made a noise there.

"Hello, little one." Her voice sounds like an angel inviting you into the heavens. It's smooth sund eases your fear further, alllowing you to move again and even though you don't piss yourself, you still shake uncontrollably. "My name is Tiki. Please to meet you little one."

Her name. You know it from somewhere, but where? What is it with all these deja vus you're having?! How in the f**k did you even end up like this anyway! You're screaming this in your mind, while you somhow stammer your response. "I-I-I a-a-am..." You barely manage to get your name out. Your fear of Tiki is more than obvious at this point.

"Please, don't be afraid of me, little one. I mean you no harm." You could hear a hint of sadness in her voice, which means she is atleast somewhat honest, so you try to stop shaking, which you somehow manage to do. Though despite the fact that you try to trust Tiki, her next action catches you off guard. She reachs out for you. She isn't doing it very fast, but to you at your current size it was pretty damn fast. Your fear gets control of you again and you curl up in a ball and cower in fear in front of her. You can feel yourself being picked up very gently and Tiki lifts you over to her.

Before you have even the slightest idea of what she's doing, you're firmly being pressed against her chest. Her skin is soft and smooth like no other you had felt before and the the constant heartbeat you hear in an unchanging rythem. The entire time she pets your back with one of her fingers - which are slightly shorter than you are tall, making you estimate yourself to be all most 4 inches (around 10 cm) tall - and is humming a friendly and calming melody.

You two remain like this for a few minutes, all the while you feel safe within her hands. Your head is clear of almost anything until you start to look down slightly. Everything below you is blocked by Tiki's breasts and they are more than above average in size. Almost the instant you get a small view, you start to blush and close your eyes, slowly uncurling in Tiki's hand. Though it's taking a lot of discipline in order to get the thought, of her breasts, that stick out about a foot more than you are tall from her chest, out of your head. You just hope Tiki didn't see you looking down.

After another few minutes Tiki pulls you back, you now sitting in the middle of her hands. Once again that awkward silence comes over you two, as neither of you know what to say. Despite the fact that you don't mind it, since the silk gloves Tiki's wearing are comfortable and you get a first row view of her, you feel a bit uneasy inside.

"Um... I'm s-sorry for being afraid o-of you, lady Tiki", Damnit! You still can't control your fear! "But I-I just woke up a few hours ago, after I got shrunk apperently." That must have been the most ridiculous thing you ever said, but what else could you say?

"There is no need for you to appologize, little one. Normal things and people must be very intimidating to you." At least she understands your current situation. "But, plase. There is no need to be so formal. We're equals after all." ... Did She just call you EQUALS?!

"I-I don't think, I quiet understand la- Tiki. I mean, what can I even do on my own like this. I could probably get killed by a small rat or the like. In fact I don't even know, where I am." You are fully aware of the situation you're in and there is no point in denying it. Also, where in the actual f*** are you? Before you passed out you where in an allyway in a huge city with skyscrapers pretty much everywhere! Hey, you're starting to get your fear, somewhat, under control now.

"Your situation does not change who or what you are, am I right? Everyone is born the same, so why would one be above another? To me, we are equals so please, do not think of yourself so lowly." The entire time she talks, her gentle smile never leaves hr face.

"Thanks, Tiki, but I still don't know what I should do or how I can return to normal. Not to mention, that there is nothing that CAN'T kill me..."

"For now you can stay with me, little one." That sentence alone makes your heart rise. "I came here to rest and restore my powers in order to aid a group of warriors that try to free this land from Walhart the Conqueror." Another one of those names, that you're familiar with! At this point you feel like hitting your head on the stones Tiki is sitting on. "They have some very experienced mages with them, so they might be able to change you back if it is some sort of curse or spell. Until then you will be safe with me. Though for now you can move around as you please. These ruins are protected by ancient magic." Did she just mention MAGIC twice? Ahh, whatever. At this point you're willing to believe anything to stay sane.

"Thanks a lot, Tiki. I gladly accept your offer." Though it wasn't much of an offer, but it just feels like the right thing to say in your head.

You could feel and a second later see, that Tiki was lowering her hands, and you with them, down to her lap. You look up only to see her beautiful green eyes close.

"Then for now I shall rest. Once I awaken again, we shall go and seek the help of..." And off to the land of dreams, she is. You have to admit, that her falling asleep like that is kind of cute. But you are in for one hell of a surprise, when she suddenly starts to glow in a weak light. After you get over the initial shock, though there is little worry as the glow doesn't seem to affect anything and after what you've seen so far, you couldn't care any less.

Now there is only one thing for you to decide left. Do you stay here in the lap of the sleeping Tiki and maybe take a nap yourself.

Or

Do you go and explore these ruins a bit on you own. The dragon statues make it seem particularly interesting and a part of you feels strangly drawn to it.

"...Ugh...why does my head hurt so much...?" you thought as you sat up for what felt like the first time in days.

You rubbed your head and looked down to see what hard surface you were laying on.

"Jeeze, no wonder my body hurts so much, I fell asleep on the ground! But...where am I, and how did I wind up out here?"

You look upwards to what seemed to be a huge open field with large trees surrounding the area. Suddenly you felt the ground start to shake violently...

WHOOSH!!

A deafening sound charged past you and you quickly jumped out of the way. You took your hands off your ears and opened your eyes again to see what made that ear-shattering sound.

You saw men with swords on horses battling each other in the distance! You looked behind you to see even more battles raging in the bachground! At first you thought this was all some kind of hyper-realistic reenactment, but then you noticed...everything was HUGE!

All around you giant soldiers clad in heavy armor charged and swung at other soldiers. You couldn't believe your eyes! Sparks flew from clashing swords, shields banged together with a loud clang, and armored horse-drawn men galloped at each other with rage!

Having run out of energy to fight your fate, you start to black out...

...

After an uncertain amount of time, you awaken to see mainly red in front of you. How could you have survived Eirika’s digestive system? You try to run, but are unable to move or feel your limbs. A low gurgle from behind suddenly assaults your ears...or, what remains of them.

You quickly panic as it becomes clear that you’ve become a conscious part of Eirika’s stomach muscles! Trying to thrash around and yell for help, your efforts only result in tiny, goosebump-like reverberations in the skin of your captress’s belly.

Having finally made it back to her tent, Eirika abruptly feels a series of little twinges in her midsection. Putting a hand to her tummy, the princess wonders what could be causing it to act up...
12111221132.title: Captive of Eirika’s Belly

choices: Yes, and she tries to help you out
Nope. Enjoy your new life as belly muscle!
Yes, but she decides to tease you
121112211322.content:
“Maybe I’m just hungry...” Eirika muses, much to your dismay. She’d mistaken your squirms within her abdominal muscles for mere stomach gurgles! Rubbing her belly a little, the princess then exits her tent and heads over to the mess tent for a nice, big meal.

As Eirika begins to eat, you hear her chew the food up above before she swallows a mouthful down into her stomach, right behind where your soul is trapped. It’s difficult from your current position to tell what your captress is eating, but it’s definitely filling up her gut. In fact, once Eirika starts to get full, you feel a slight push from behind you - your prison seems to be getting tighter!

With all the strength you have, you wiggle and thrash again within Eirika’s abs in a desperate effort to get her attention. Does she notice your plight?
121112211322.title: Royal Appetite

choices: Eirika decides she’d eaten enough for now
Eirika overeats and gets a stomachache
1211122113223.content:
“Hm..?”

Looking down, Eirika is quick to notice a series of tiny goosebumps breaking out across her stomach. She tries to ignore the sensation and continue eating, but the little twinges continue to bother the princess. Her cheeks flare up for a moment as Eirika realizes what’s going on here...

“Oh...you must be that little man I swallowed earlier!” Eirika says at last. “Aw, are you trying to escape?” She tauntingly shakes her hips, rocking you about within her abdominal muscles, before giving her belly a few soft pats. “Well, it’s not going to work. You’re stuck in there, forever! So just relax and enjoy your new home...”

With that, Eirika resumes her meal, continuing to fill up her tummy and further tightening your fleshy cell. You keep trying to squirm and yell for help, but unfortunately your movements get more restricted as your captress stuffs herself with more and more food...
1211122113223.title: Getting Full Yet?

choices: A battle AND a big meal in one day? Eirika's feeling sleepy now!
The two of you are still alone in the mess tent, so Eirika teases you more.
Before Eirika can leave, one or more of her female friends show up!
12111221132231.content:
Mentally calling out to your captress to stop, you attempted to plead with her to show mercy on you. The world was so... tight! Your whole body (or at least, whatever area could be considered 'your' body was sooo sore, Eirika's tummy just starting to protrude outwards as her stomach rapidly filled up.

It hurt! Like, not super bad, but it was definitely uncomfortable for you. Eirika's stomach was definitely a little bloated from the size of her meal (probably from a combination of both the amount of food she'd eaten as well as the speed she'd eaten it at.) You could feel a significant amount of air bubbles shifting in Eirika's packed tummy behind you, the feeling of them rolling, shifting, and pressing against the taut stomach walls creating an almost unusual massaging sensation. You would have actually enjoyed the mildly soothing feeling if Eirika's stomach wasn't so darn full. It felt like the princess had swallowed something entirely solid, her belly was as firm and hard as a rock to the touch, with barely any give to it.

The princess evidently thought that she was full too, pressing one hand to her rock hard tummy and not feelin the hand sink in at all.

"*Phew* My, that was filling! I'd better stop now, another bite and I just might burst! Hee hee hee! How're you feeling little guy? Sore, maybe? A little squeezed, perhaps?"

You attempted to wriggle, hoping to upset the princess's overfilled stomach, but it was so densely packed that you couldn't manage much more than creating goosebumps on the surface of her flesh.

Eirika giggled at the pleasant sensation, and after looking around to make sure no one else was present in the mess tent she rolled up her red tunic to expose her full, very slightly bulging stomach before rubbing it gently.

"Mmmm... I must say, that meal really hit the spot! It might be a little crass of me to say so, but a hard day on the battlefield always makes me hungry!" Continuing to rub her full tummy, the princess cooed,

"Awww... how's that feel, little guy? Because I'm sure enjoying this!"

You didn't want to admit it, but after being stretched out by Eirika's filled-to-the-brim stomach her rubbing actually felt like a soothing massage to you. Rather than answer her, you wriggled a little at feeling her hand directly rubbing the patch of her belly that you occupied. You hadn't meant anything buy it, just trying to get more comfortable, but your faint movements had dislodged a bubble of air in Eirika's tight tummy...

"*Buuurp* Oh my, excuse me! You know little man, its rude to make a woman burp like that!" Rolling your nonexistant eyes at Eirika's comment (unlike earlier when she thought you'd been looking up her skirt there wasn't any real heat to her words now), you just groused to yourself. The princess's cheeks had turned a faint pink at the rather unladylike burp she'd made, but what was she expecting would happen after eating such a large meal? At least she didn't seem mad at you anymore... As a whole the princess's mood seemed rather relaxed. You weren't sure what would happen to you now, because it didn't seem like Eirika was intent on moving anywhere anytime soon, even if she had finished eating. Maybe now that she was in a good mood you could convince her to help you?
12111221132231.title: After a big meal Eirika's feeling full!

choices: Eirika wakes up to find that all of her skirts seem to have shrunk...
Eirika sits down at the mess hall to find herself sitting higher in her seat...
Hey, you aren't done yet! Struggle, maybe you can get the princess's attention!
12111221133.content:
Well, shit. The princess's cold words told you you'd get no sympathy from her, and watching whatever had aaaalmost dropped into your hands dissolving in the lake of acid told you that you that you were going to die in here. You may have been big enough to force the sphincter open (both of them, even though the entrance to her throat was currently out of your reach), but the only way to the princess's... lower exit, was through the steaming pool of acid. It may not've been very big, looking like a garden-sized pond to you at your two-inches-or-so of height, but you really didn't want to dive into that pond even if it was only for a short while. You'd likely only have the strength to make one attempt at forcing the sphincter open, and if it failed you'd be agonizingly melted into a flesh puddle. Kind of like a wax figurine dissolving under a heat lamp. Yeah.

Well, those were sobering thoughts. You were feeling surprisingly calm about all of this, especially falling your rage-quit from only a few minutes ago. You likely would've sat on the spongy 'shore' of the stomach, contemplating life, free will, and the meaning of existance until you expired had the princess not tripped over a rock at that very moment.

To be fair, what happened next was purely accidental. While the princess's words indicated that she felt no mercy in executing you in an exceedingly brutal manner, you'd never know for sure if she truly meant them or had only been trying to scare you into submission. Either way, as the princess stumbled and fell forwards, a look of startled alarm on her face, the contents of her stomach were sent bouncing around inside the fleshy sac.

You barely had time to scream as the acid covered you, and as the princess righted herself you were sent tumbling back into the deepest point of her stomach along with the acid. While not deep, the acid was astonishingly powerful and made short work of you. Robbed of your strength and blinded by the pain, you could do nothing but thrash for a few moments before succumbing to the caustic liquid.

--------------------<Unknown Time> The Next Day-------------------

Coming to your senses an unknown amount of time later, you awoke to find that there was some kind of soft cloth covering you, and while you were no expert it felt more like cotton than anything else. The pristine white fabric, while not thin by any means did feel as if it were a little stretched around you. You attempted to sit up and gain a better view of where you were, but came to a startling discovery. You couldn't move! Doing your best to get your breaths under control... wait. You weren't breathing. You couldn't feel your lungs. In fact, you couldn't feel anything outside of a vague sense of self. You were existing, but you didn't seem to be able to move much on your own.

Oh Goddammit. You remembered now- that stupid, vain, princess had swallowed you whole. And all because you'd gotten an ACCIDENTAL look at her underwear. Speaking of the underwear that had brought about your doom, you were now pretty sure you knew where you were. Through the vague sense of self that remained in you, you were able to feel the soft, plush feeling of the flesh all around you as well as the smooth, soft fabric of the princess's panties.

Talk about ironic. Even if it wasn't fair to you at all, you had to snort at this turn of events. Maybe somebody up there had a sick sense of humor.

You didn't have eyes to close or open, but you could still somehow see everything around you... not that there was much for you to look at, with about 90% of your vision obscured by the princess's stretchy underwear. Rather than taking residence on what particular cheek or location of the princess's rear, you seemed to have assumed the form of a thick layer of flesh overtop the princess's originally modestly-sized backside.

You'd been somewhere in the 2~4 inch range inside the princess's stomach, but right now it seemed like significantly more mass than that had been added to the princess's rear. Nothing huge by anyone's standards, but if you had to estimate you'd probably added an extra inch worth of padding to the princess's buttocks.

Hah, serves her right. It wasn't much, but you'd take this minor win. Hopefully giving the princess a thicc, fat ass would cause her no small amount of headaches throughout her day.
12111221133.title: A final bitter act- padding the princess's rear

121112211333.content:
Hearing gentle snores far from your current fleshy prison, you assumed Eirika was asleep at this point. It was hard to tell, since you’d been digested into fat on her ass. And as fun as it was to think about how the princess would be teased for her extra padding, you didn’t want to stay trapped in here forever. Trying to wiggle and squirm around, you were only successful in causing Eirika’s rear to wobble very slightly.

Your gambit seemed to work - Eirika slowly awoke from her slumber upon feeling her butt tremble faintly. In a bid to maintain her notice, you wobbled with more strength...but how would your captress react?
121112211333.title: Wobbling in Eirika’s Rear

choices: Eirika approaches the mess tent; fighting has made her hungry
Eirika heads toward her tent to get some sleep
Eirika goes to meet with one of her group's mages.
121112212.content:
A sudden jolt sent you flying up into the air, bouncing you around against the soft walls of Eirika's stomach. The sizable (in comparison to you) pool of water around your waist was spread all around the stomach, with each jolt, bounce, and external movement, leaving you even more drenched and dazed than before. Unlike your passage down Eirika's throat, this new torment seemed to be unending, and you could only wonder when it would stop.

-------------------------

Eirika continued to run, swiftly putting distance between herself and the blank patch of grass where she had picked you up. The recently-ended skirmish had carried her much further from her comrades than she had initially believed, and she was in a hurry to get back to the safety of her camp. Having just driven the traitorous Carcino elder Pablo's mercenary forces from this region of the mercantile nation, she knew she had to do remain observant lest more of his loyalists ambush her.

As she ran, her mind wandered to the tiny person in her stomach. Swallowing him had not been easy, and she had nearly choked when she had forced him down her throat. Now, she could feel him bouncing around in her stomach, and despite her earlier ire towards him she was overcome with worry. Maybe he had been telling the truth, and she had gulped down an innocent civilian in a fit of misguided anger.

Coming to a sharp halt, Eirika placed one hand over her cloth-covered belly, chewing her lip as she pondered her previous actions.

Frowning, she tried to imagine something her brother would say, something like "A proper king or queen must never show regret for their actions! Each action must be accompanied by absolute certainty and unflinching resolve!" Wincing, the princess sighed in consternation. The unpleasant taste of regret clung to her tongue, and she was quite sure that she had acted too hastily in punishing you for her believed slight. But she was a princess, a young woman who would one day rule over a nation of people, and she had to take responsibility for her own actions.

Her brother had always said it was better to ask for forgiveness than permission, after all. After she let you out of her stomach, she would apologize for her unfair and unnecessarily harsh actions towards you, and then she would care for you until you used the counterspell to unshrink yourself.

Eirika did, after all still firmly believe that you had used a magic spell on yourself. Being a fairly learned student of elder magic (what Lyon stated common folk knew as dark magic) she was aware of a shockingly wide school of spells, sorcery, and other black arts that could drastically alter a living human body. She had no reason to assume that you really were innocent of all suspicion and wrong-doing, she just didn't believe that you invading her privacy and attempting to peek at her underwear warranted such a harsh sentence.

As Eirika neared the end of the mountain path that signaled the edge of her war-camp, she slowed to a graceful stroll. It wouldn't do for her comrades to see their princess in such a flustered state.
121112212.title: 2) Your world begins to shake! Eirika's mov...

choices: Your POV, still trying to find a way out of this mess
Eirika gets pulled away from the mess tent by a messenger looking for her.
1211122121.content:
"Heeey! Eirika! Over here!"

Eirika smiled at Vanessa's enthusiastic voice. The Frelian knight had been a valuable companion ever since her king had pledged the woman's services to Eirika. While she wasn't the strongest fighter, her skills in the air and bond with her pegasus made her an excellent scout and rescuer. More than that, her bright, cheerful attitude never failed to lift Eirika's spirits after a long day of fighting, marching, or foraging.

Smoothing her skirt beneath her, Eirika plopped her ample rear down next to her friend. Vanessa had called her over to the mess tent, and had evidently started eating before anyone else.

"Having a late lunch, Vanessa? You know dinner isn't far off..." Eirika pointed out, sending a bit of good-natured needling at her friend.

"Ha, you know me! I'll be ready for food then too!" Vanessa giggled at Eirika's question.

"Anyways, thanks for joining me! You want something? There's plenty here but you're going to have to get your own plate. I'm not sharing!"

Of course, Eirika couldn't resist looking down at the veritable feast laid out before Vanessa. How anyone, a woman much less, could eat so much in one sitting was beyond her. If he were here, her brother would've likely teased her, saying that she could try to match Vanessa's legendary appetite bite-for-bite- but that was a stretch! She didn't eat thaaat much...

But as she sat thinking, her belly's occupant bouncing around within her reminded her that her stomach was completely empty save for him. Vanessa giggled cheerfully at the loud growl that emanated from the princess's midsection.

"Well, I think that answers my question! Grab some of the venison, Neimi brought it down herself and Franz prepared before the battle. Its sooo good!" Vanessa moaned. She'd clearly been enjoying herself immensely- the array of meats, veggies, bread, and seasonings spread before her looked positively delectable!

Eirika absentmindedly rubbed her grumbling tummy. Well, she didn't have to let you out right away... That's right, this was just part of your punishment! Giving you some company in there would ensure you thought twice about peeking at a girl's underwear!

Her mind made up, Eirika moved over to the multitude of trays laid out for the dinner rush.



*Doreedo's note* Fun fact, one of Vanessa's supports in Sacred Stones states that one of her hidden skills is that she can out-eat anyone.
1211122121.title: Eirika approaches the mess tent; fighting has m...

choices: Before Eirika can leave, more of her friends enter the tent.
Eirika decides to leave and find a way to free you
Some of Eirika's friends hold a contest to see who can eat the most.
12111221212.content:
*Chomp* Chomp* *Munch* Munch*

"Mmmm! It's all sooo good!" Vanessa moaned in delight, slumping forwards on the bench and narrowly avoiding faceplanting onto the now empty plate that she'd just finished clearing. A giggled softly at her friend's antics. The plate that she was busily working through wasn't small by any means (and was in fact a little larger than average for her), but it didn't compare to the small feast that Vanessa had just consumed.

Eating at a much steadier pace, Eirika smiled as she felt her stomach continue to fill up with food. She couldn't feel her 'passenger' jumping around inside of her, so he must've been buried by the internal avalanche of chewed up food.

Hmm... it was a little unpleasant to think about, but it was his punishment! She couldn't show weakness here!

Besides, she was planning on letting him out soon anyway- he wouldn't have to suffer his torment for much longer.

"Ah, Eirika! Enjoying the meat? I'm so glad you like it, I just shot it the other day! Franz really is a whiz at curing and preparing the game I bring in for us,"

Looking over at the new voice, Eirika was delighted to see Neimi, another one of her friends enter the mess tent. The short, purple-haired girl looked deceptively meek and innocent. While it was true that she was something of a crybaby, the purplette was a master with the bow and arrow. Eirika wouldn't want to get on her bad side, the recently promoted Sniper knew how to end someone's life without ever alerting them to her presence.

"It's excellent! You and Franz have my compliments- the two of you are lifesavers! I don't know how any of us in this army would manage without the two of you,"

"Ha ha, you kid! There's really not enough of us to call what we are an army, anyway. Platoon, more like"
12111221212.title: Eirika starts eating!

choices: Shrunk by the hot, self-centerd, enthusiastic Princess, Lady L'Arachel!
Shrunk by the assertive, young, Mage prodigy, Lute!
Shrunk by the beautiful, extremely caring and protective Cleric, Natasha!
122.content:
Lady L'Arachel (or just L'Arachel) is the hot Princess of Rausten, a very optimistic, energetic Troubadour who is always trying to save anyone she sees from evil. She is very self-confident even to the point of being self-centered. Still, she is never mean-spirited; only slightly arrogant. Being a very strong-willed and an enthusiastic royalty, she acts very high-class and is always wary of manners, expecting great respect from others....Including you...

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/L%27A...

Lute, a young female Mage who's most apparent trait is that she believes that she is a prodigy. She has a very mature and serious air and shows her vast amount of knowledge whenever speaking. She may truly be a prodigy, and she asserts her superiority often (and could easily do it to you in your shrunken state). However, she is not used to dealing with people normally. Although she is willing to hold conversations, she has difficulty with feelings such as love.

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Lute

Natasha, a beautiful Cleric, who, no matter the situation, cares first and foremost for the well-being of her people. She is humble, thinking nothing of the healing work that she does, only that it is her duty to protect others. She is supportive of her friends, no matter their background or home country. She is generally shy at first, but easily warms up to conversation. Though she is a servant of the church, she stretches her bounds quite often. She is very sweet, praising and helping others with their needs.

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Natas...
122.title: Lady L'Arachel, Lute, or Natasha

choices: Shrunk by the sensitive, but determined Pegasus Knight, Princess Tana!
Shrunk by the stylish, but inexperienced new Recruit, Amelia!
Shrunk by the busty, playful, and caring Dancer, Tethys!
123.content:
Princess Tana (or just Tana) is the quite pretty and lively princess of Frelia who is also good friends with Eirika. Tana is a friendly, cheerful, and determined Pegasus Knight. She is very talkative, even when others are quiet, and is quite sensitive, but does her best to support Eirika's forces. She is willful and determined to do what she believes is right and often tells others not to call her "Princess".

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Tana

Amelia is an orphan who joined the Grado army to serve her country, but is inexperienced in combat. After questioning Grado's morals, she joins Eirika's forces as a Recruit. She is a stylish and cheerful new soldier who does her best while fighting. As a new soldier, she sometimes trips and often shows signs of a poor fighting stance, but tries to get practice in whenever she can. She is very truthful and honest, stating what she believes is true and her inner feelings to others. Overall, she is quite friendly and optimistic (and would probably love to have a shrunken man like you with her).

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Ameli...

Tethys is a rather busty Dancer who is from the country of Jehanna. She is a very graceful and beautiful woman who is confident in herself and her dancing abilities. She is quite sociable and often can be teasing and playful (which could come easy from her to one as small as you). To those she is close to, Tethys is very kind and caring (another good quality!).

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Tethy...
123.title: Princess Tana, Amelia, or Tethys

choices: Shrunk by the extremely quiet, pretty, but determined pushover Myrmidon, Marisa!
Shrunk by the cute, young-looking, good-natured, shy Manakete, Myrrh!
Shrunk by hot, motherly, but friendly Falcon Knight, Syrene!
124.content:
Marisa is a pretty female Myrmidon from the country of Jehanna. Known as the Crimson Flash, she is very quiet and extremely dedicated to sword-fighting. She is not very sociable and is very dedicated to improving her skill at the sword. She even sleeps on her right side so she can quickly grab her sword with her dominant left hand. She really is not mean-spirited or uncaring; she is just really quite shy and not very talkative. She lets others make decisions for her and just goes along with them, even if she doesn't necessarily agree.

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Maris...

Myrrh, a young and cute Manakete, is an incarnation of the legendary Great Dragon of old who aided mankind during the first great war against the Demon King. She is a member of a race of human-like people with wings on their backs who can transform into dragons using Dragonstones. She appears and acts like a very shy and good-natured young girl. She appears as a very small child, but she is really a Great Dragon roughly 1,200 years old. Still, she acts as a small child. She is quite unfamiliar with human contact (maybe you could help with that...?). Myrrh speaks very little, and although sometimes hesitant, she is unafraid to express her feelings.

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Myrrh...

Syrene is a matured and hot Falcon Knight who is the commander of the Pegasus Knights of Frelia and Vanessa's older sister. She is a caring, polite woman, friendly to all she interacts with. She always tries to care for others, but she likes to think of herself as a mother more than as a sister. Still, she often tries to be a "hero". She is always friendly and polite, and prefers that Vanessa and Princess Tana see her more as a sister than a superior. She is a good cook, able to prepare traditional Frelian dishes. Many look up to her, as a sort of older sister figure (let's see what you are to her...).

More info: http://www.fireemblemwiki.org/wiki/Syren...
124.title: Marisa, Myrrh, or Syrene

1323.title: Someone else

13231.content:
"Wake up. Wake up already!"

You stir in your sleep. There's some woman yelling at you... "Go away mom, I'm getting up..." You mumble, rolling over.

"I said, wake up!"

You sit up groggily, rubbing your eyes. "Huh? What's going on? Did something happen...?" Your head aches, and your vision is blurry, like you just woke up from a nap that was far too short. After looking around for second, you realize, in shock, something did indeed happen. You're in a giant room, with a giant girl staring at you.

"Who and what are you? I could have you put to death for spying on me in my room, you know!" The purple haired girl looks down at you rather threateningly. It would be entirely convincing, but you can see the vaguest of upturns at the edge of her lip...

"Wh...who are YOU?" You're completely befuddled. This entire situation makes no sense! A giant, purple haired girl, in an old-timey dress and in an old-timey room... what in the world is going on?

She seems truly annoyed now, however, like the thought that you don't recognize her is unthinkable. She seems a good bit more convincingly angry now... hopefully she isn't actually angry... "You mean you don't know? I'm the Apostle, Sanaki! How would you not know about me? It doesn't matter - who and what are you? Some kind of Laguz?"

The realization of where you are hits you like a ton of bricks. 'Am I really in... Path of Radiance? How in the world did I end up in my game? ...And shrunk, no less? And... in... Sanaki's room?' All of these questions race through your head, but you know just sitting there won't get you any answers. Not too mention the gigantic girl glaring daggers at you seems to think you were spying on her. Considering who she is, that isn't the best possible impression... It'd be best to come up with some kind of cover story, quickly...
"I'm, uh... I, uh, don't really remember. I remember that I'm a human, yeah, and that I'm supposed to be regular sized, like you, but... I can't remember my name, or anything.

"...You do realize how good I am at telling when someone is lying, correct? I deal with misleading nobles all of the time. I know you know your name, and I'm certain you know a good bit more than you're letting on."

You're starting to sweat... But, telling her the truth would just make it worse, wouldn't it? "I swear, I don't know how I ended up here, or how I became so tiny! Please, don't hurt me!"

"Hm... well, you seem to be telling the truth on that account." For the first time, you see her start to crack a smile. "As long as you're willing to behave, I'm certain we can both entertain each other quite well. Life in the palace is horribly dull, and I am always looking for diversions... I'm certain you have no objections, correct?"

...It probably wouldn't be a good idea to have objections. You just hope that this entertainment isn't something dangerous...

151.content:
So you get shrunk by...
