15131.content:
You are lying on your back, just about to wake up for the morning. You notice that your bed feels pretty uncomfortable. It feels like you're sleeping on the floor, in fact. You run your hand against the surface beneath you. Yep, that's a carpet. Did you fall off of bed? You'll have to actually wake up all the way and open your eyes to know for sure. You reluctantly do so, rubbing your eyes and sitting up groggily. You open your eyes to see... Not your room. The walls and ceiling are painted stone, the furniture is extremely fine woodwork, and the floor is covered in a colourful carpet. It was like a room in some medieval castle. But this room seems...large in a weird way. you stand all the way up and are instantly shocked to see your perspective not change at all. You're still low to the floor somehow. That's impossible, you think. The only way this could happen is if you were... about an inch tall.

Your train of thought is derailed suddenly by a rhythmic booming noise, slowly growing louder. The ground shakes and the massive wooden door in front of you swings open. A titanic woman clad in crimson and gold armour stands in front of you. Her deep red hair reaches to her shoulders, creating a bold frame for her strikingly beautiful face. Your staring was interrupted by a voice coming from the hallway. "Commander Minerva, a moment, please. I have a report to make." The red titan, whose name seems to be Minerva, replies to the voice. "Very well Catria. State your report." She turns around to face the voice, which resulted in you getting an excellent view of her big, round backside, which was held in well-fitting dark red medieval-style pants. "The troops have finished preparations for the journey to the wyvern's dale. We await your command. "Excellent. Tell everyone we will move out in three days." "Yes, commander." More rhythmic booms come from the hallway as the girl leaves. Minerva turns back around and closes the door. She's now facing in your direction, and she...
15131.title: Minerva

151311.content:
The giant turns around to face you. You continue to look up at the titan in awe. Her armoured boots must be as thick as bunker walls and reach multiple stories into the air. Her thighs are thick enough to engulf an entire bus. Her armour shines in warm hues of red and gold. And her face... is looking right at you.

Had she spotted you? at the size of an ant, you thought you were safe from being detected. But her eyes seemed to lock with yours. Swiftly, she takes two short steps forward, closing the entire distance between you within a mere moment. Her index finger and thumb pinched you from either side and lifted you into the air at great speed. When the ride stopped you were face-to-face with an incredibly angry giant who could easily squish you like a bug if she applied just a tiny bit more pressure. "Who are you? What are you doing in here? Are you some sort of spy? Or are you just trying to peek on me? How did you get this small?" The barrage of questions from the booming voice of your captor catches you off guard for a moment, but you regain your composure and manage to interject. "Hey, hey, I'm not a spy, I'm not trying to peek, I don't know how I got this small, I just woke up and I was on the ground here, reduced to an inch tall. I swear, I wasn't trying to do anything." You stare at the angry face in front of you, hoping you explanation was satisfactory to the woman holding you in her grasp.
151311.title: Spots you

choices: You wake up normally the next day.
Minerva shifted in her sleep so you wake up in an awkward position.
1513111.content:
You finish your explanation and Minerva simply stares at you, her angry expression not faltering. There's a pause that lasts for a few moments, but to you, it felt much longer, as the anticipation builds of what your captor's reaction will be. Finally, she does something. She sighs, her expression softens, her grip on you loosens, and then she looks at you. "I... suppose I was a bit accusatory there. Even if you were a spy or something I can't really see why anyone would willingly shrink themselves like this, after all, you could get stepped on." "Yeah, trust me. Being this size is a little difficult." Minerva chuckled at your unintentional wordplay. She placed you in her palm and sat down on the bed. Staring up at Minerva, her face took up most of your vision, but thankfully her expression was not so angry.

"So you don't have any idea how you got here or how you got this small?" "No, the last thing I remember is going to bed at night, and when I woke up, I was here." "That's a conundrum indeed. Well, it isn't particularly safe for you to be walking around on your own at this size, so how about you stay here with me and I'll personally keep you safe?" "I'd really appreciate that, thank you." "Excellent. Now, it's getting quite late, so I need to go to sleep. That means I need to change into my nightwear." She stands up, places you on the nightstand, and looks at you with a serious expression. "I trust that you can promise not to look while I get changed." "Yeah, Of course." "Good." She walks to the large wooden dresser and you turn around to make sure you don't peek. Sounds of armour being unbuckled and clothes moving about reach your ears. You think to yourself, maybe one little look wouldn't hurt. As your head begins to turn, you snap it forward again. This woman just offered you protection in your time of need, and she had already shown you her angry side. Pissing her off would be a bad idea. Besides, it was just plain rude. So you kept your back turned, like you promised.

A bit of time passes and you hear her large footsteps come towards you, but softer this time as she had removed her metal boots. "Alright, you can look now, little one." You turn around to have your eyes meet a wall of red fabric. You look up to see her face sporting a warm smile. She looked beautiful in her nightgown. It was a muted red with some light orange designs adorning it near the neck opening, shoulders, and the ends of the sleeves. The orange designs were similar in shape to the swirling gold patterns on her armour. "Well don't stare too long, your eyes will dry out." the voice of your giant protector broke the trance you didn't even know you were in. "Oh, sorry about that." "Don't worry about it, not every day you see a giant, after all. Now come here." She places her hand on the nightstand, signaling you to get on. You climb onto her hand, and she uses her other hand to snuff out the last candle lighting the room.

To your surprise, she crawls into bed with you still in her hand. You fully expected her to put down some sort of cloth as a makeshift bed for you or something. Minerva gets under her blanket, then places you atop her chest, putting her hands on top of you. "Goodnight, little one." "Uh... Yeah, goodnight." Minerva's hands make for an effective blanket, you're quite comfortable, and soon find yourself drifting off to sleep, despite the fact you woke up only a short while ago, that felt like a sleep which was interrupted halfway by the light and uncomfortable floor, so getting a proper nights rest would be great. Your eyes close, and you fall asleep atop your new protector's chest.
1513111.title: She believes you and apologizes.

1513112.content:
The giantess' eyes squint, clearly unamused. "You just 'woke up here'? That's a lousy excuse if I've ever heard one!"

Her two fingers that were holding you tight begin to tighten even more. "You'd better give me a real explanation, or I'm afraid this won't end well." You can't believe your ears-- not only did this woman not buy your story, but she was ready to crush you over it! The air in your lungs running out, you do the unthinkable:

"Alright, alright! I confess!" You cry out with your remaining breath, owning up to a misdemeanor you didn't commit. Almost immediately the woman's fingers loosen, sending you tumbling onto her palm. You gasp for air, greedily taking in as much as possible in case this girl decided to repeat her crushing trick. It takes a few seconds for you to remember the angry face looking down at you, at which point you quickly stammer a story. "I, uh, shrunk myself in order to... spy on you. That's the truth."

Ironically enough your fake story was somehow more believable to your captor as she frowns and continues, "Aha! As I suspected. Well then, I suppose it's only fitting I punish you somehow..." You don't like the sound of that, especially since it's unclear what interpretation of "spy" this girl will use to justify whatever she does next. After a brief moment to consider her actions, the commander above you decides to...
1513112.title: Lie for your life

151312.content: The massive woman starts walking. You're stuck in place like a deer in headlights as her boots get closer and closer to you. It only takes her two steps to cover what looked like a football field worth of ground. You fall on your back right as her foot passes by you. You ended up unharmed. How lucky. Once you shake off the shock of nearly being stomped on by a lady knight, you decide that at your size, you really need help. This girl is currently your best bet, so you begin walking towards her in hopes to make contact with her. But, wait... She's undoing the straps of her armour. She's definitely getting undressed. And it's in front of a bed, so she's very likely going to go further than just her armour. You realize that now isn't a great time to make yourself known. You don't want to make this girl angry, especially when she can crush you like a bug, and peeping on an undressing girl is very rude. You look to the closest piece of furniture to you, a wooden bedside table, and make a run for it. Your attempt to hide turns out to be...
151312.title: She walks right past you

1513121.content:
You dart towards the shadowy underside of the building-sized bedside table. You attempt to keep your breathing as low as possible, all the while praying to your higher deity of choice that the titanic red knight didn't see you. You wait a moment. You hear buckles being undone and metal armour being dropped to the ground with a loud thud. If she's continuing as normal, then it stands to reason that she never saw you. However, sticking your head out just a tad to check couldn't hurt, could it?

You slowly work your way forward to the edge of the bedside table, making sure to keep to the shadows. You stop your advance when you reach the point where you can see the gargantuan woman's entire body. It seems that you took a peek at the right time as when you look up, you see the woman removing her shirt, placing it in a basket to be washed later. Her pants soon follow, and you see a sight you could only have dreamed before now. A woman the size of a high-rise building stood in front of you clad in nothing but a red bra and matching panties. Looking up at her was dizzying, but the view was more than worth it.

Your eyes follow the motions of her well toned legs as she walks around the room, snuffing out the candles which once illuminated the room. The snuffing of the final candle saddened you, as it removed the amazing view of her body from your line of sight. Based on context and sound, you assume she then crawled into the extravagant bed at the side of the room.

Your eyes adjust to the dark after a moment, it quickly changes your opinion about the candle snuffing from earlier. The giant woman must've been quite tired, to the point where she didn't even bother to get under the covers. You could clearly see her now thanks to the moonlight. But that moonlight, the way it illuminated her body was somehow even more beautiful than the candlelight. Her breasts, thighs, and abs seemed to shine in the soft, blue light.

The giant appeared to have already fallen asleep, and her body looked so inviting. Surely it would be fine to explore a bit, it's a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, after all. After a moment, you decide on exploring...

152131.content:
"Uh, it was this way?"

You said as you were walking in a forest, apparently for hours. This zone was rumored to be somehow cursed, despite the innocence appearance of the place, like it was just another timber in all Elibe.

But now after just keeping the footsteps for a long time, you realized you were lost, not just that, for some reason it was completely silent, not a single animal was in sight. Just what kind of place you ended?

You keep thinking options to realize your location, not matter the directions you turn, you always senses like walking on circles, to the point on left totally disoriented.

"Maybe, i just climb a tree? I can guide myself with a mountain in mind... huh?"

A sudden sound of grass interrupted your thoughts. The lack of any sort of sound just made it more louder that normal. It could be a human? an animal? Or worse a monster?

You keep looking around for some time, before hearing another step that made you look directly were it came from, surprised.

There was a human figure under some trees shadow, covered in some kind of cloth, that was covering the upper part of her face. But the slender figure, and the size, made you realize it was a woman.

"H-Hello? You live here?" You asked confused, as the woman started walking in your direction, each of her footsteps pressing the grass.

"You, how do you found this place?" The woman asked. Her voices was calm, but also deep. A neutral tone without emotions. She lifted her faces to look at you, her nose and mouth were visible, alongside some lock of her purple hair.

You gulped, despite be a bit smaller than you, her presence was intimidating "Im just lost... sorry to disturb, i want to go away" you explained, smiling a bit to don't look suspicious to her eyes.

"Lost, huh?" A slight smile was painted in her lips "What unfortunate human..." she slowly extended one of her slender arms to you.

"What do you..." her palm was now a bit near your face "...mean?... AAAAAA" a sudden purple light appeared from her hand, now extending around your body, what was happening? You tried to escape, but the magic was so strong that your body just didn't wanted to move.

"No one should come here in the firts place, never..." she muttered as her magic vanished, descending her hand from you. You tried to walk away, but your balance was nonexistent, as you fell mouth first in front of the woman "enjoy your last sleep, human"

Your eyes were starting to close, as you finally looked at her red, emotionless eyes, as she rise up her right leg, revealing the sole of her barefeet, clean for some reason. And then, the woman started to growth, no... you felt your body shrinking. But before you could think about it, the now giantess sole slowly landed over you, as your lost your energy.

info.brief_description: You wake up in the hands of one of the lovely ladies from the Fire Emblem games!
info.description:
You wake up one day to find that you are only about 2 inches tall and in the vicinity of one of the girls from the Fire Emblem games(and their respective worlds)!
I won't delete much of anything as long as you follow these simple rules:

1- You may be shrunken in the presence of more than one girl at a time.
2- To ensure a first person point of view for most viewers, please do not assign the person a name. Only refer to your character in the second person (ex: YOU looked up. YOU told her YOUR name) you get the point by now.
3- I'm mostly going to be including only the Fire Emblem games released outside of Japan, though there will be options for the others that weren't.
4- Though most fetishes will be allowed please try to refrain from insertion, death, and digestion(though they are okay, don't overuse them). Mouthplay and vore (strictly oral) is completely fine.
5- No male/male interaction please, although the girls can interact with them, that is fine!
6- Your character is roughly 2-4 inches tall. Please keep it in that range and refrain from altering the size of anyone or anything else.
7- The girls can be whatever kind of giantess you want: kind, cruel, playful or apathetic, but give them a good reason to be those things and please try to keep them in character.
8- PLEASE use decent grammar and punctuation and keep the story in English.
9- Try to refrain from killing you or your giantess off or ending the story early, if you do, give another option for a different outcome.
10- Though I will allow a short chapter once in a while, I will delete if you post nothing but one or 2 sentence chapters.

One more thing: One of the main mechanics of Fire Emblem games is building relationships between the characters, this is also one of the main mechanics of this story. Build your relationship with one(or more) of the girls as the story progresses!


GPs for good additions! Have fun!

Edit 10/11/13: Over 5,000 views!

Edit 5/11/14: Over 15,000 views!!

Additions are greatly appreciated!!!
